verbs.description: < p > [ARG0: President Trump] [V: issued] [ARG1: a stern warning] [ARG2: to Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau] [ARGM-TMP: on Thursday] , [ARGM-ADV: saying that the U.S. would either accept a " fair deal " on the North American Free Trade Agreement ( NAFTA ) or none at all.</p] >

< p > [ARG0: President Trump] issued a stern warning to Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau on Thursday , [V: saying] [ARG1: that the U.S. would either accept a " fair deal " on the North American Free Trade Agreement ( NAFTA ) or none at all.</p] >

< p > President Trump issued a stern warning to Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau on Thursday , saying that the U.S. [V: would] either accept a " fair deal " on the North American Free Trade Agreement ( NAFTA ) or none at all.</p >

< p > President Trump issued a stern warning to Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau on Thursday , saying that [ARG0: the U.S.] [ARGM-MOD: would] either [V: accept] [ARG1: a " fair deal " on the North American Free Trade Agreement ( NAFTA ) or none] [ARGM-LOC: at all.</p] >
